name: ValueTransformer
desc: An abstract class used to transform values from one representation to another.

items.name: class func setValueTransformer(ValueTransformer?, forName: NSValueTransformerName)
items.desc: Registers the provided value transformer with a given identifier.

items.name: init?(forName: NSValueTransformerName)
items.desc: Returns the value transformer identified by a given identifier.

items.name: class func valueTransformerNames() -> [NSValueTransformerName]
items.desc: Returns an array of all the registered value transformers.

items.name: struct NSValueTransformerName
items.desc: Named value transformers defined by NSValueTransformer.

items.name: class func allowsReverseTransformation() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver can reverse a transformation.

items.name: class func transformedValueClass() -> AnyClass
items.desc: Returns the class of the value returned by the receiver for a forward transformation.

items.name: func transformedValue(Any?) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the result of transforming a given value.

items.name: func reverseTransformedValue(Any?) -> Any?
items.desc: Returns the result of the reverse transformation of a given value.
